name: @monay/icon-migration
description: Safe migration scripts for converting lucide-react to @monay/icons

scripts.migrate:full: npm run 1-analyze && npm run 2-backup && npm run 3-migrate-live && npm run 4-update-packages-live && npm run 5-verify
scripts.migrate:dry-run: npm run 1-analyze && npm run 3-migrate-dry && npm run 4-update-packages-dry

author: Monay Development Team
